plot: "Wounded soldiers are lying around, watching the arrival of a poor fellow on a stretcher from the front. The nurse and attendants all have the red cross on their arms."
title: The Red Cross at the Front
plot_es: "Wounded soldiers are lying around, watching the arrival of a poor fellow on a stretcher from the front. The nurse and attendants all have the red cross on their arms."
original_name: The Red Cross at the Front
plot_en: "Wounded soldiers are lying around, watching the arrival of a poor fellow on a stretcher from the front. The nurse and attendants all have the red cross on their arms."
